byline.original: By AURELIEN BREEDEN and KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA
byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden reported from Paris, and Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura from London. Benoît Morenne contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: One suspect was killed and at least one other was on the run in a raid that left four officers wounded and traumatized a Brussels neighborhood.

headline.print_headline: Raid in Brussels Linked to Paris Attacks Erupts in Deadly Shootout
headline.main: Brussels Raid Linked to Paris Attacks Erupts in Fatal Shootout

snippet: One suspect was killed and at least one other was on the run in a raid that left four officers wounded and traumatized a Brussels neighborhood.
abstract: Police counterterrorism raid in Brussels linked to Paris terrorist attacks erupts in shootout, leaving one suspect dead, one missing, four officers wounded and neighborhood under lockdown and in state of shock.
